episodes.title: The best microphone under $200
episodes.text: With so many microphones on the market, how are you supposed to know what’s the best? Take a look at our top picks.

episodes.title: Mic tricks to take you to the next level
episodes.text: Is hardware really worth it when it comes to podcasting? The answer is...it depends. Here’s our reasons on why you might want to consider picking something up.

episodes.title: Should you get outboard audio gear?
episodes.text: Stop rolling with those default settings on your mic. These small tweaks will take you from sounding good to great.
